MinIO.description:
MinIO is an S3-compatible object storage server.

Based on the official docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/minio/minio, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

After installation, In order to access the built-in MinIO Admin Portal visit http://ROCKSTOR_IP:9001.
MinIO.more_info: This Rock-on uses the official MinIO Docker image to implement a single MinIO instance with a single object storage share, suitable for use on a private network.  If your connections traverse a network you do not control, consider using a VPN for encryption.
